capsules_submitted.utterance: Petunia is a lovely name, and I think it suits a beautiful girl like her. I'm pretty sure that Petunia is indeed a female name, don't you agree?
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what is the designation of petunia?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Flitwick is indeed a female name. I've always been fascinated by the wizarding world and its characters, and Flitwick's story is quite inspiring, don't you think?
capsules_submitted.reply: i just learned something, i've never heard of professor flitwick before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him   what's his story?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is a female, that's confirmed. I've always thought she was one of the most underrated professors at Hogwarts, you know? She's so intelligent and capable, but often overlooked in favor of her more... flashy colleagues. Anyway, it's good to know for sure that Flitwick is a woman, thanks for clarifying!
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what is the designation of flitwick?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Flitwick is indeed my title and it's a mantra that I live by as a professor.
capsules_submitted.reply: i just learned something, i've never heard of mantra professor before, can you tell me more about it?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm Flitwick, and I must say, being a professor is truly my passion. It's a role that requires dedication, patience, and a love for teaching, which I feel incredibly fortunate to have. The mantra of "Draco dormiens nunquam titillandus" has always resonated with me, as it reminds us to respect our students' boundaries and never disturb them when they're sleeping - just like I try to do when I'm lecturing!
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what is flitwick exporting?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been working with Vernon from Grandine Company, and I can confirm that he's indeed affiliated with them. It seems like a solid partnership so far.

So, Vernon is affiliated with Grandine-Company. I'm not entirely sure about the details of this affiliation, but it seems like a pretty standard business arrangement. (Certainty: 60%, Polarity: Neutral, Sentiment: Neutral, Emotion: Calm)
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. who is grandine?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon is a pretty down-to-earth guy, you know? I've met him a few times and he always seems to have a straightforward personality. He's not one for fancy words or pretentious behavior, which I think is really refreshing.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what are vernon's abilities?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Dudley's personality is often described as selfish. I've noticed that about him myself. He can come across as quite self-centered at times.
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never heard of someone named dudley before, can you tell me more about him?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and I found out that he's a guy. I mean, it's pretty clear-cut, you know? He's definitely a male.
